description:
Afterworks is an open training program, consisting of a series of short courses, by Porto Design Factory, designed as a complement of specialization for students and professionals of all areas with the presence of world class teachers in different thematic fields.
The courses always start at 18h31, that is, always after work, in Porto Design Factory.
name: Afterworks sessions: A hands-on 101 introduction to micro-controllers (arduino), electronics and coding
